about.name: About
about.content: **v. 0.0.1-alpha** A grid-based colour mixing webapp. Currently powered by Reactjs and Bulma. ### Credits #### Icons All icons sourced from [SVG Repo](https://www.svgrepo.com/). The icons are a part of the [Variety Duotone Filled Icons](https://www.svgrepo.com/collection/variety-duotone-filled-icons/) collection, by [Mary Akveo](https://www.svgrepo.com/author/Mary%20Akveo/) ##### Links to specific icons * New Grid: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/465014/file-new * Save Grid: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/466126/save * Load Grid: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/465091/folder-alt * Export Palette: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/464910/export-2 * Change Background: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/465762/paint-roller-2 * About: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/465309/information-circle * Help: https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/465958/question #### Technologies - Javascript - Reactjs (via vite) - use-debouncy - react-colorful - markdown-to-jsx - Bulma (CSS) ### Repositories - [Codeberg](https://codeberg.org/mifuyne/colgrid) - [Gitlab](https://gitlab.com/mifuyne/colgrid) - [Github](https://github.com/mifuyne/colgrid) ### License GPL v3

help.name: Help
help.content:
1. Click on a cell.
2. Click on another cell across from the first
3. Watch the magic happen! ðŸŽ‰

(Video coming soon!)

### FAQ
##### Q: How do I get the hex codes for the new colours?
**A:** Click on the cell of choice and you should see the hex code in the text input.
